thread.title: Lindsey Graham: Imagine GOP Reaction If a Democrat Criticized Intel Community Like Trump Did
thread.title_full: Lindsey Graham: Imagine GOP Reaction If a Democrat Criticized Intel Community Like Trump Did

author: Josh Feldman
title: Lindsey Graham: Imagine GOP Reaction If a Democrat Criticized Intel Community Like Trump Did
text:
Lindsey Graham: Imagine GOP Reaction If a Democrat Criticized Intel Community Like Trump Did by Josh Feldman | 8:24 pm, January 12th, 2017 video WATCH: Not healthy to question the competency and loyalty of US intel community, Sen. Graham says of pres.-elect's "Nazi Germany?" tweet. pic.twitter.com/FnhnLNx97i 
— NBC Nightly News (@NBCNightlyNews) January 12, 2017 
Earlier today Senator Lindsey Graham lamented some of President-elect Donald Trump ‘s criticisms of the intel community: 
“I don’t think it is helpful for the Commander-in-Chief to question the competency, loyalty of those who are risking their lives to defend the nation, and the last thing I would say about anybody working in the intelligence community is to compare them to Nazi Germany.” 
Graham is referring to this tweet: Intelligence agencies should never have allowed this fake news to "leak" into the public. One last shot at me.Are we living in Nazi Germany? 
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) January 11, 2017 
“I can only imagine,” Graham concluded, “what we would have said if a Democrat said that.” 
Watch above, via NBC.
